      • findUsableObject

        public Usable findUsableObject(org.newdawn.slick.geom.Rectangle rect)
        Returns an Entity implementing the Usable interface that's located within the given Rectangle.
        Parameters:
        rect - a Rectangle.
        Returns:
        The Entity within the given rect, or null if no Entity was found.

      • touchingSolidObject

        public java.util.ArrayList<Entity> touchingSolidObject(Entity ent)
        Checks for collisions between one Entity and others in the level.
        Parameters:
        ent - The Entity to check hits for.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList with Entities that intersect with ent.

      • findIntersects

        public boolean[] findIntersects(Entity ent1,
                       Entity ent2)
        Parameters:
        ent1 - The entity to check the collisions for.
        ent2 - The entity to check the collisions against.
        Returns:
        A boolean list, the order is top, right, down, left. True tells there is an intersect.
